title: Bodyguard Bureaucrat

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Service (Night): Choose two targets. Your first target will be forced to protect the second as a Bodyguard. This effectively replaces your first target's action.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will lose your Service ability once you successfully protect someone from death.
- You may not choose an individual player as your first target for Service more than once per game.
